content: Enable this option if you want to add groups from LDAP server to {{productName}} Accounts. Please note that only users who belong to these groups will be added.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a tooltip explaining the purpose of enabling group membership from an LDAP server in {{productName}} accounts. It appears as a help button when the "Enable this option" checkbox is selected, and its content will be displayed when the user hovers over the label.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Hesablarına' is misspelled. It should be 'Hesablarına'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hesablarına

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'nəzərə alın' is grammatically awkward. It's better to use a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: xahiş edirik qeyd edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation uses a period (.) at the end of the first sentence, which might be more appropriate with a comma (,) to match the English version's flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Активирайте тази опция, ако искате да добавите групи от LDAP сървър към {{productName}} профили, молим да имате предвид, че ще бъдат добавени само потребители, които принадлежат към тези групи.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "budou přidáni" is grammatically incorrect. It should be "budou přidáni uživatelé" or "bude přidán uživatel". The original English suggests individual users are being added, not a general addition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Budou přidáni uživatelé.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable `{{productName}}` is not consistently formatted within the Greek translation. It is enclosed in Greek characters, which might cause rendering issues. It should ideally remain as is to ensure proper substitution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Keep the variable as `{{productName}}`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "-tileihin" in "{{productName}}-tileihin" is not a natural translation for 'Accounts'. It implies adding groups to tiles, which is not the intended meaning.  'Accounts' should be translated to something more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota tämä vaihtoehto käyttöön, jos haluat lisätä ryhmiä LDAP-palvelimelta {{productName}}-käyttäjätileille.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'käyttäjätileille' is not properly capitalized. It needs to be capitalized as a noun.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota tämä vaihtoehto käyttöön, jos haluat lisätä ryhmiä LDAP-palvelimelta {{productName}}-käyttäjätileille.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation lacks the double curly braces around `productName` as present in the English source.  This will likely cause rendering issues.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "{{productName}}" to "{{productName}}" in the Armenian translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation retains the English phrase 'LDAP 서버' (LDAP server) which might be more naturally expressed as 'LDAP' in Korean technical documentation. While understandable, it's a minor stylistic point.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider simplifying to 'LDAP에서 {{productName}} 계정에 그룹을 추가하려면 이 옵션을 활성화하세요.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຂອງເຈົ້າດ້ວຍ" (of you with) at the end of the first sentence feels unnatural and unnecessary. It doesn't directly translate to the English meaning and sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove "ຂອງເຈົ້າດ້ວຍ" or rephrase the sentence to something like "ເພີ່ມກຸ່ມຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP ໃສ່ບັນຊີ {{productName}}ໄດ້" (can add groups from LDAP server to {{productName}} accounts).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The wording "ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຢູ່ໃນກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າ" is a bit literal and could be more natural.  A more fluent translation might better convey the exclusivity of the group membership.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to "ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເປັນສະມາຊິກຂອງກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າ" (only users who are members of these groups will be added) or "ພຽງແຕ່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຢູ່ໃນກຸ່ມເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະຖືກເພີ່ມເຂົ້າ" (only users in these groups will be added).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'aceată' is a misspelling of 'această'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați această opțiune dacă doriți să adăugați grupuri de pe un server LDAP la secțiunea Conturi {{productName}}. Vă rugăm să rețineți că vor fi adăugate numai utilizatorii din aceste grupuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "මෙම සමූහයන්ට අයත් පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එක් කරනු ලැබේ" is a somewhat literal translation and could be more naturally phrased. It implies 'only enthusiasts' instead of 'users'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සමූහයන් වල සාමාජිකයින් පමණක් එක් කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the ellipsis (dots) within Sinhala text can be awkward. It’s better to rephrase for smoother readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the ellipsis if possible and rephrase the sentence for better flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{productName}} is not properly formatted within the Slovak translation. It should be consistent with the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Túto možnosť povoľte, ak chcete pridať skupiny zo servera LDAP do účtov {{productName}}. Upozorňujeme, že pridaní budú len používatelia, ktorí patria do týchto skupín.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Upoštevaj, da bodo dodani..." is a somewhat awkward and overly formal translation of "Please note that...". A more natural phrasing would be "Pozor, da bodo..." or "Opomba, da bodo..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pozor, da bodo dodani samo uporabniki, ki pripadajo tem skupinam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Омогуц́ите' is a valid but somewhat archaic or formal way to say 'Enable'. A more common and natural phrasing would be 'Укључите'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укључите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ц́е бити додати' is grammatically correct but could be more concise and natural. A more fluent phrasing would be 'додаће се'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: додаће се

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Omogućite' should be lowercase to maintain consistency with the English 'Enable'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: omogućite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Imajte na umu da će biti dodati samo korisnici koji pripadaju ovim grupama.' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Samo korisnici koji pripadaju ovim grupama će biti dodati.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Samo korisnici koji pripadaju ovim grupama će biti dodati.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bu gruplara ait olan kullanıcıların' could be improved for clarity and naturalness. A more idiomatic translation would convey the meaning more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sadece bu gruplara üye olan kullanıcılar eklenecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Увімкніть цей параметр" is a bit formal for a tooltip. A more conversational and user-friendly alternative would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть цю опцію

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "буде додано" (will be added) is slightly awkward. It implies a future action that might not be immediate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: будуть додані

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placeholder {{productName}} is not properly handled. It appears verbatim in the Vietnamese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace {{productName}} with the actual product name or use a placeholder that can be dynamically populated.
